ygData.subject: Re: Screaming Terror gets an overhaul!
ygData.msgSnippet: Like mes it s nice if you have  two frogs you use it and then fight one. I d say it s about 30-45 seconds long. Naeeldar ... From: Mark Muller
ygData.messageBody:
Like mes it's nice if you have two frogs you use it and then fight one. I'd
say it's about 30-45 seconds long.

Naeeldar
